function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on unknown parameters in people movement models for building occupancy estimation","Impact":"Inaccurate occupancy estimation, leading to ineffective building operations and emergency response","Mitigation":"Use alternative methods for occupancy estimation that do not rely on unknown parameters","Technologies":"Sensor-based occupancy estimation, AI-based occupancy prediction models","People":"Building managers, emergency responders","Owner":"Building management, emergency response teams"},{"Description":"Inability to obtain real people flow data during emergency egress situations","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of building occupancy during emergencies, leading to ineffective egress management","Mitigation":"Invest in advanced emergency response systems with real-time people flow monitoring capabilities","Technologies":"Real-time occupancy sensors, video analytics for people counting, crowd management systems","People":"Emergency responders, building occupants","Owner":"Emergency response teams, building management"},{"Description":"Computational expense and potential stability issues in optimization-based people flow estimation methods","Impact":"Limitation in scalability for large-scale building occupancy estimation, particularly in mega-tall buildings","Mitigation":"Explore parallel computing techniques to improve computational efficiency, implement distributed optimization algorithms","Technologies":"Parallel processing systems, distributed computing frameworks","People":"Building managers, engineering teams","Owner":"Building management, technology teams"}]}
